EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Greetings
Dear {!Lead.Name}, Thank you for applying to be a part of the Ffreedom Team.
Request you to send us your updated CV.
Also please send us your reply to the following Questions at hr@ffreedom.in
1. Tell us about the Yourself 2. What are you passionate about? [work, creative output, issues, communities etc.] 3. Why do you want to apply at Ffreedom Financial Planners?
Please take the time to answer the questions thoughtfully, with enough detail to help us understand who you are.
We will get in touch with you after receiving your responses.
Look forward to hearing from you.
Sincerely,
Team Ffreedom
